title: Brescia-COVID Respiratory Severity Scale (BCRSS)/Algorithm
desc: The Brescia-COVID Treatment Algorithm is a step-wise approach to COVID-19 treatment and management based on disease severity.

orgreference.text: Italian Society of Infectious and Tropical Diseases (SIMIT). Guidelines on therapeutic and supportive management for patients with COVID-19 coronavirus infection. 2020.

data.evidence:
Brescia-COVID Treatment Algorithm:

*Inclusion criteria for tocilizumab:

  1. End of the initial phase of high viral load of COVID-19 (e.g. apyretic from >72h and/or elapsed ≥7 days after the onset of symptoms).
  2. Worsening of respiratory exchanges, such as to require non-invasive or invasive support from ventilation (Level ≥3).
  3. High levels of IL-6 (>40 pg/mL); alternatively high levels of d-dimer, CRP, ferritin, and/or fibrinogen progressively increasing.

From Italy's latest SIMIT Guidelines.
